title: EnglishPod 初级 英文播客 0142

segments.en: Hello, everyone.
segments.cn: 大家好。

segments.en: Welcome back to another lesson with us here at EnglishPod.
segments.cn: 欢迎回到EnglishPod的另一节课。

segments.en: My name is Marco.
segments.cn: 我叫Marco。

segments.en: My name is Catherine, and that's us.
segments.cn: 我叫Catherine，这就是我们。

segments.en: And that's us.
segments.cn: 这就是我们。

segments.en: And today we're going to talk about a very common situation when you're a couple, when you have a girlfriend.
segments.cn: 今天我们要谈论一个非常常见的情侣情况，当你有女朋友时。

segments.en: Honey, come on.
segments.cn: 亲爱的，快点。

segments.en: I want to go.
segments.cn: 我想走了。

segments.en: Are you?
segments.cn: 你准备好了吗？

segments.en: You are taking forever.
segments.cn: 你真是磨蹭。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好吧。

segments.en: Who takes long?
segments.cn: 谁磨蹭？

segments.en: Like, do you take a long time to get ready to get dressed?
segments.cn: 你准备好穿衣服需要很长时间吗？

segments.en: Okay, I take longer to get ready, but my boyfriend takes longer in general because he's like checking his email, playing video games, like just, you know, we call it lollygagging.
segments.cn: 好吧，我准备的时间比较长，但我男朋友一般需要更长时间，因为他在查看邮件、玩视频游戏，像是，我们称之为磨蹭。

segments.en: He's just like being kind of slow.
segments.cn: 他就是有点慢。

segments.en: I'm the opposite.
segments.cn: 我正好相反。

segments.en: I usually start getting ready later.
segments.cn: 我通常开始准备得晚。

segments.en: Like, if we have to leave at 9, I'll start getting ready at 8.30, but I'll be ready by 9.
segments.cn: 比如说，如果我们9点要离开，我会在8:30开始准备，但我会在9点前准备好。

segments.en: Because I take a shower real fast, get dressed, and I know what I'm going to wear, and all my clothes are ready.
segments.cn: 因为我洗澡很快，穿衣服也快，我知道我会穿什么，所有衣服都准备好了。

segments.en: But on the other hand, my girlfriend takes forever to get ready.
segments.cn: 但另一方面，我女朋友准备的时间很长。

segments.en: And she's like, oh, and then, you know, the hair... Girls have makeup and tights and shoes.
segments.cn: 她会说，哦，然后，你知道，头发……女孩们有化妆、紧身裤和鞋子。

segments.en: But this is what I understand.
segments.cn: 但我理解的是。

segments.en: If we're supposed to leave at 9, why don't you start getting ready before?
segments.cn: 如果我们9点要离开，为什么不早点开始准备呢？

segments.en: Never underestimate women.
segments.cn: 永远不要低估女性。

segments.en: I don't know.
segments.cn: 我不知道。

segments.en: Procrastination.
segments.cn: 拖延。

segments.en: It's not even about procrastination.
segments.cn: 这甚至不是拖延。

segments.en: Sometimes it just takes longer to look good than other times.
segments.cn: 有时候，打扮得好需要的时间比其他时候更长。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: Well, in this case, we're going to be looking at a lesson where it's the opposite.
segments.cn: 好吧，在这种情况下，我们要看一个相反的课程。

segments.en: The husband is taking a long time to get ready and, well, I don't think he has a very good fashion sense, right?
segments.cn: 丈夫花了很长时间准备，而我认为他的时尚感不是很好，对吧？

segments.en: He does not.
segments.cn: 确实如此。

segments.en: And we're going to learn what that phrase means in a minute here.
segments.cn: 我们马上就会学习这个短语的意思。

segments.en: But before we get going, I've got a couple of words to preview to help you understand what's going on in today's dialogue.
segments.cn: 但在我们开始之前，我有几个词要预览，帮助你理解今天的对话。

segments.en: Vocabulary preview.
segments.cn: 词汇预览。

segments.en: All right, so vocabulary preview.
segments.cn: 好吧，所以词汇预览。

segments.en: Today we have two words.
segments.cn: 今天我们有两个词。

segments.en: The first one can be a noun or a verb.
segments.cn: 第一个可以是名词或动词。

segments.en: To iron.
segments.cn: 熨烫。

segments.en: Or iron.
segments.cn: 或者熨斗。

segments.en: So to iron basically means to... To get the wrinkles out of clothes.
segments.cn: 所以熨烫基本上是指……去除衣服上的皱纹。

segments.en: And so we use this... iron is actually a metal.
segments.cn: 所以我们使用这个……铁实际上是一种金属。

segments.en: It's a very important metal.
segments.cn: 这是一种非常重要的金属。

segments.en: And an iron is a machine that we plug in.
segments.cn: 而熨斗是一种我们插电的机器。

segments.en: We use it to get the wrinkles, the lines, out of our shirts and our skirts and everything.
segments.cn: 我们用它来去除衬衫、裙子等的皱纹和线条。

segments.en: And so it's actually a very important thing to make sure that you look nice and put together.
segments.cn: 所以确保你看起来整洁是非常重要的。

segments.en: Right, so you use an iron to iron your shirt or to iron your skirt.
segments.cn: 对，所以你用熨斗熨烫你的衬衫或裙子。

segments.en: And then we have sandals.
segments.cn: 然后我们有凉鞋。

segments.en: My favorite type of shoe.
segments.cn: 我最喜欢的鞋子类型。

segments.en: Mine too.
segments.cn: 我也是。

segments.en: Sandals.
segments.cn: 凉鞋。

segments.en: I have a friend who used to say she had claustrophobic feet.
segments.cn: 我有一个朋友曾经说她有幽闭恐惧症的脚。

segments.en: Her feet didn't like to be in closed spaces and so she only wore sandals.
segments.cn: 她的脚不喜欢待在封闭的空间，所以她只穿凉鞋。

segments.en: So these are open shoes, open toe shoes basically.
segments.cn: 所以这些基本上是开放式鞋子，露趾鞋。

segments.en: You wear them at the beach.
segments.cn: 你在海滩上穿它们。

segments.en: Or you wear them in the summer in general.
segments.cn: 或者在夏天穿。

segments.en: I'm wearing sandals right now.
segments.cn: 我现在穿着凉鞋。

segments.en: And you have different types of sandals like sandals and flip flops, right?
segments.cn: 你有不同类型的凉鞋，比如凉鞋和人字拖，对吧？

segments.en: Flip flops.
segments.cn: 人字拖。

segments.en: I think they're called that because they sound like flip flop, flip flop.
segments.cn: 我想它们之所以叫这个是因为走路时发出“翻翻”的声音。

segments.en: When you walk.
segments.cn: 好吧，这就是我们今天的两个词。

segments.en: Alright, so those are our two words today.
segments.cn: 让我们第一次听对话，然后我们再回来。

segments.en: Let's listen to the dialogue for the first time and then we'll be back.
segments.cn: 亲爱的，快点。

segments.en: Honey, come on.
segments.cn: 我们要迟到了。

segments.en: We're going to be late.
segments.cn: 说实话，你准备的时间比我长。

segments.en: Honestly, you take longer getting ready than I do.
segments.cn: 我在吹干头发和熨烫衬衫。

segments.en: I was drying my hair and ironing my shirt.
segments.cn: 你能过来一下吗？

segments.en: Can you come here for a sec?
segments.cn: 我需要你的帮助。

segments.en: I need your help.
segments.cn: 什么事？

segments.en: What is it?
segments.cn: 为什么这些衣服都在床上？

segments.en: Why are all these clothes on the bed?
segments.cn: 我不知道穿什么。

segments.en: I don't know what to wear.
segments.cn: 好吧，给我你的意见。

segments.en: Okay, give me your opinion.
segments.cn: 你喜欢这个样子吗？

segments.en: Do you like the way this looks?
segments.cn: 这件条纹短袖衬衫配这件格子毛衣和我的幸运凉鞋。

segments.en: The striped short sleeve shirt with this checkered sweater and my lucky sandals.
segments.cn: 我喜欢这条短裤的剪裁和下摆，所以我想我也会穿这些。

segments.en: I like the cut and hemline of these shorts, so I think I'll wear these as well.
segments.cn: 你在开玩笑吗？

segments.en: Are you joking?
segments.cn: 我该怎么处理你？

segments.en: What am I going to do with you?
segments.cn: 你是去参加晚宴，不是去海滩。

segments.en: Wear the shirt with the silk tie I bought you and those corduroy pants.
segments.cn: 穿上我给你买的那件带丝带的衬衫和那条灯芯绒裤子。

segments.en: It's chilly outside so you can wear this coat.
segments.cn: 外面有点冷，所以你可以穿这件外套。

segments.en: Thanks, honey.
segments.cn: 谢谢，亲爱的。

segments.en: You have such great fashion sense.
segments.cn: 你的时尚感真好。

segments.en: Now what am I going to do with my hair?
segments.cn: 那我该怎么处理我的头发？

segments.en: All right, we're back.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们回来了。

segments.en: So, um, interesting.
segments.cn: 所以，嗯，有趣。

segments.en: This husband sounded a lot like a famous president, I think.
segments.cn: 这个丈夫听起来很像一位著名的总统，我觉得。

segments.en: He did, but we'll get to that in a minute.
segments.cn: 确实如此，但我们一会儿再谈。

segments.en: Before we do talk about who this guy is, I think it'd be a great idea to talk about some of these clothing terms, because they're very useful for when you want to go shopping and for when you're getting dressed.
segments.cn: 在我们谈论这个家伙是谁之前，我觉得谈谈一些这些服装术语是个好主意，因为它们在你想购物和穿衣服时非常有用。

segments.en: Language takeaway.
segments.cn: 语言收获。

segments.en: Okay, so the first word that we have on language takeaway is striped.
segments.cn: 好吧，所以我们在语言收获中第一个词是条纹。

segments.en: All right, you might have heard the American flag called stars and stripes.
segments.cn: 好吧，你可能听过美国国旗被称为星条旗。

segments.en: Stripes are those lines on clothing or on flags that go up or down or left and right.
segments.cn: 条纹是衣服或旗帜上上下或左右的线条。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是如此。

segments.en: So you have, if you have a striped shirt, you have many lines on your shirt that are going up and down or left and right.
segments.cn: 所以如果你有一件条纹衬衫，你的衬衫上有许多上下或左右的线条。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: And they say with fashion, lines that go left to right make you look fatter and lines that go up and down make you look thinner.
segments.cn: 他们说在时尚中，左右的线条会让你看起来更胖，而上下的线条会让你看起来更瘦。

segments.en: And taller.
segments.cn: 还有更高。

segments.en: And taller.
segments.cn: 还有更高。

segments.en: Very good.
segments.cn: 非常好。

segments.en: And now moving on, if it's summer and you want to wear a shirt, you can wear a short-sleeved shirt.
segments.cn: 现在继续，如果是夏天，你想穿衬衫，可以穿短袖衬衫。

segments.en: All right, this is important.
segments.cn: 好的，这很重要。

segments.en: So most people like to wear short-sleeve shirts in the summertime because they're cooler.
segments.cn: 所以大多数人夏天喜欢穿短袖衬衫，因为它们更凉快。

segments.en: And in the wintertime, that means we like to wear long-sleeved shirts.
segments.cn: 冬天，我们喜欢穿长袖衬衫。

segments.en: Okay, so the sleeves are basically the arms of the shirt.
segments.cn: 好的，袖子基本上就是衬衫的臂部。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正确。

segments.en: So you say short-sleeved.
segments.cn: 所以你说短袖。

segments.en: Very good.
segments.cn: 非常好。

segments.en: And then we have a checkered shirt or a checkered sweater in this case.
segments.cn: 然后我们有一件格子衬衫或在这种情况下的格子毛衣。

segments.en: Okay, so checkered means there are little squares on the shirt.
segments.cn: 好的，格子意味着衬衫上有小方块。

segments.en: And usually one square is one color and then next square is another color.
segments.cn: 通常一个方块是一个颜色，下一个方块是另一种颜色。

segments.en: So it looks like a checkerboard.
segments.cn: 所以看起来像棋盘。

segments.en: Very good.
segments.cn: 非常好。

segments.en: That game, you know, checkers.
segments.cn: 那个游戏，你知道的，跳棋。

segments.en: Or like a chessboard.
segments.cn: 或者像棋盘。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正确。

segments.en: And so in this case, we've got a guy who's trying to wear a striped shirt and a checkered sweater.
segments.cn: 所以在这种情况下，我们有一个人试图穿条纹衬衫和格子毛衣。

segments.en: That does not go well to us, right?
segments.cn: 这对我们来说不太合适，对吧？

segments.en: No.
segments.cn: 不。

segments.en: Too much stuff happening.
segments.cn: 太多东西了。

segments.en: It's too busy.
segments.cn: 太繁杂了。

segments.en: Too busy.
segments.cn: 太繁杂了。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: And not only that, but he wanted to wear shorts because he liked the cut and the hemline.
segments.cn: 不仅如此，他还想穿短裤，因为他喜欢剪裁和下摆。

segments.en: Okay, these are actually terms that we normally use with women's clothing because you could say, I like the cut of this dress.
segments.cn: 好的，这实际上是我们通常用在女性服装上的术语，因为你可以说，我喜欢这条裙子的剪裁。

segments.en: I like the shape that it has.
segments.cn: 我喜欢它的形状。

segments.en: Very good.
segments.cn: 非常好。

segments.en: And hemline is the bottom of your skirt or your trousers or your shorts.
segments.cn: 下摆是裙子、裤子或短裤的底部。

segments.en: And hemline, we could say, my mother used to say this to me, the hemline is much too high.
segments.cn: 下摆，我可以说，我妈妈以前对我说，下摆太高了。

segments.en: Much too short.
segments.cn: 太短了。

segments.en: That skirt is not appropriate.
segments.cn: 那条裙子不合适。

segments.en: Yeah.
segments.cn: 是的。

segments.en: So it's nice to have a hemline at the knee.
segments.cn: 所以在膝盖处有一个下摆是不错的。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: So the cut is the shape that the piece of clothing has, like pants or skirts.
segments.cn: 所以剪裁是衣服的形状，比如裤子或裙子。

segments.en: And the hemline would be the place where it ends, right?
segments.cn: 下摆就是它结束的地方，对吧？

segments.en: The skirt, for example.
segments.cn: 比如裙子。

segments.en: Like, it pretty much tells you the length of something.
segments.cn: 就是，它基本上告诉你某物的长度。

segments.en: Very good.
segments.cn: 非常好。

segments.en: And now, well, and now the wife steps in, she's like, no, no, you're not wearing this.
segments.cn: 现在，嗯，现在妻子进来了，她说，不，不，你不能穿这个。

segments.en: She's telling him that she has to wear nice clothes.
segments.cn: 她告诉他她必须穿得体的衣服。

segments.en: And among those items is a silk tie.
segments.cn: 其中一件是丝绸领带。

segments.en: Okay, so classic Father's Day gift.
segments.cn: 好的，经典的父亲节礼物。

segments.en: Silk tie.
segments.cn: 丝绸领带。

segments.en: I've given this one a couple of times.
segments.cn: 我送过这个几次。

segments.en: A silk tie is a, you know, a neck tie, a long neck tie that's made of silk.
segments.cn: 丝绸领带是，你知道的，长领带，是用丝绸制成的。

segments.en: Silk is a very soft material, right?
segments.cn: 丝绸是一种非常柔软的材料，对吧？

segments.en: Very expensive as well.
segments.cn: 也非常贵。

segments.en: It can be, especially Italian silk.
segments.cn: 可能是，尤其是意大利丝绸。

segments.en: And I've always actually wanted to have silk sheets.
segments.cn: 我一直想要丝绸床单。

segments.en: Oh, see, I don't know.
segments.cn: 哦，我不知道。

segments.en: I feel like they would get very warm in the summer.
segments.cn: 我觉得夏天会很热。

segments.en: Yeah.
segments.cn: 是的。

segments.en: Well, in the winter, it would be awesome.
segments.cn: 嗯，冬天会很棒。

segments.en: But probably very cold in the winter as well.
segments.cn: 但冬天可能也会很冷。

segments.en: Yeah, I don't know.
segments.cn: 是的，我不知道。

segments.en: Well, it's one of those things.
segments.cn: 嗯，这就是其中之一。

segments.en: And, and then she's also telling him to wear some corduroy pants.
segments.cn: 然后她还告诉他穿一些灯芯绒裤子。

segments.en: Okay, so it sounds like this might be a winter dialogue because corduroy is not something you wear in the summer because it's very heavy and thick.
segments.cn: 好的，这听起来像是冬天的对话，因为灯芯绒不是夏天穿的东西，因为它很重很厚。

segments.en: Corduroy actually is a fabric that that usually has these kind of ribs or ridges.
segments.cn: 灯芯绒实际上是一种通常有这些肋条或纹理的面料。

segments.en: And so there's like little lines in the fabric that make it quite thick and rough when you almost not rough, but they make it feel very unique when you touch it.
segments.cn: 所以面料上有小线条，使它在触摸时感觉非常独特。

segments.en: Yeah, it's not smooth.
segments.cn: 是的，它不光滑。

segments.en: It's a little bit rough, the fabric.
segments.cn: 这面料有点粗糙。

segments.en: Very good.
segments.cn: 非常好。

segments.en: So those are all the clothing items that we've looked at today.
segments.cn: 所以今天我们看过的所有服装项目。

segments.en: There's a lot of them.
segments.cn: 有很多。

segments.en: And obviously we'll post a couple of pictures on the site so you can see better what a silk tie looks like or especially corduroy pants.
segments.cn: 显然我们会在网站上发布几张照片，这样你可以更好地看到丝绸领带或特别是灯芯绒裤子的样子。

segments.en: Corduroy, yeah.
segments.cn: 灯芯绒，是的。

segments.en: All right, so let's listen to this dialogue again.
segments.cn: 好的，所以我们再听一遍这个对话。

segments.en: We're going to slow it down a little bit and then we'll come back and look at some of the phrases.
segments.cn: 我们会慢一点，然后再回来看看一些短语。

segments.en: Honey, come on.
segments.cn: 亲爱的，快点。

segments.en: We're going to be late.
segments.cn: 我们要迟到了。

segments.en: Honestly, you take longer getting ready than I do.
segments.cn: 说实话，你准备的时间比我长。

segments.en: I was drying my hair and ironing my shirt.
segments.cn: 我在吹头发和熨衬衫。

segments.en: Can you come here for a sec?
segments.cn: 你能过来一下吗？

segments.en: I need your help.
segments.cn: 我需要你的帮助。

segments.en: What is it?
segments.cn: 什么事？

segments.en: Why are all these clothes on the bed?
segments.cn: 为什么这些衣服都在床上？

segments.en: I don't know what to wear.
segments.cn: 我不知道穿什么。

segments.en: Okay, give me your opinion.
segments.cn: 好的，给我你的意见。

segments.en: Do you like the way this looks?
segments.cn: 你喜欢这个样子吗？

segments.en: The striped short sleeve shirt with this checkered sweater and my lucky sandals.
segments.cn: 条纹短袖衬衫配这个格子毛衣和我的幸运凉鞋。

segments.en: I like the cut and hemline of these shorts, so I think I'll wear these as well.
segments.cn: 我喜欢这些短裤的剪裁和下摆，所以我想我也会穿这些。

segments.en: Are you joking?
segments.cn: 你在开玩笑吗？

segments.en: What am I going to do with you?
segments.cn: 我该怎么办？

segments.en: We're going to a dinner party, not to the beach.
segments.cn: 我们要去参加晚宴，不是去海滩。

segments.en: Wear this shirt with the silk tie I bought you and those corduroy pants.
segments.cn: 穿这件衬衫和我给你买的丝绸领带，还有那些灯芯绒裤子。

segments.en: It's chilly outside, so you can wear this coat.
segments.cn: 外面有点冷，所以你可以穿这件外套。

segments.en: Thanks, honey.
segments.cn: 谢谢，亲爱的。

segments.en: You have such great fashion sense.
segments.cn: 你的时尚品味真好。

segments.en: Now, what am I going to do with my hair?
segments.cn: 现在，我该怎么办我的头发？

segments.en: All right, we're back.
segments.cn: 好的，我们回来了。

segments.en: So, uh, now let's start with fluency builder.
segments.cn: 所以，呃，现在让我们开始流利度训练。

segments.en: Fluency builder.
segments.cn: 流利度训练。

segments.en: Okay, these are classic couple phrases, right?
segments.cn: 好的，这些是经典的情侣短语，对吧？

segments.en: These are phrases you hear among couples.
segments.cn: 这些是情侣之间常听到的短语。

segments.en: And the first one is maybe more common to hear from the female end, but it's not unknown on the male end.
segments.cn: 第一个可能更常听到女性说，但男性也不陌生。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: So we have this question.
segments.cn: 所以我们有这个问题。

segments.en: Do you like the way this looks?
segments.cn: 你喜欢这个样子吗？

segments.en: So while the person is saying this, they would maybe, like, be moving to the side a little bit.
segments.cn: 所以当这个人说这句话时，他们可能会稍微侧身。

segments.en: Modeling it.
segments.cn: 模特展示。

segments.en: Do you like the way this looks?
segments.cn: 你喜欢这个样子吗？

segments.en: So basically you're saying, do you like what I'm wearing?
segments.cn: 基本上你是在问，你喜欢我穿的衣服吗？

segments.en: Does it look good on me?
segments.cn: 这在我身上好看吗？

segments.en: Does it look good?
segments.cn: 好看吗？

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是。

segments.en: You could also say, hey, I like the way this looks.
segments.cn: 你也可以说，嘿，我喜欢这个样子。

segments.en: When you're trying to buy something at the store.
segments.cn: 当你在商店里想买东西时。

segments.en: And so do you like the way this looks is a way for you to ask the other person's opinion of how you look.
segments.cn: 所以你喜欢这个样子是你询问对方对你外貌的看法。

segments.en: And also another common phrase, especially with men who have no, no fashion sense.
segments.cn: 还有另一个常见短语，尤其是对于没有时尚感的男性。

segments.en: The wife says, what am I going to do with you?
segments.cn: 妻子说，我该如何处理你？

segments.en: Okay, this is an interesting phrase and it needs some explanation, I think, because the meaning is, well, this is very difficult, right?
segments.cn: 好吧，这是一个有趣的短语，我觉得需要一些解释，因为意思是，这很困难，对吧？

segments.en: So you're being difficult or, wow, you need some help from me.
segments.cn: 所以你很难相处，或者，哇，你需要我的帮助。

segments.en: I'm going to help you.
segments.cn: 我会帮助你。

segments.en: How am I going to help you this much or all the time like this?
segments.cn: 我该如何一直这样帮助你？

segments.en: Right, because she's pretty much saying he has no idea about clothing and fashion.
segments.cn: 对，因为她几乎在说他对衣服和时尚一无所知。

segments.en: So she he's saying to her, what am she saying to him?
segments.cn: 所以她在对他说，我该如何处理你意味着你需要很多帮助。

segments.en: What am I going to do with you means you need so much help.
segments.cn: 真的。

segments.en: Seriously.
segments.cn: 好吧。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 所以，第三个短语是我们在一开始看到的时尚感。

segments.en: So, and, and the third phrase that we said with that we saw and we said at the very beginning is fashion sense.
segments.cn: 好吧，这实际上是男人需要帮助的地方。

segments.en: Okay, so this is actually what the man needs help with.
segments.cn: 他需要时尚感的帮助，因为他没有时尚感。

segments.en: He needs help with his fashion sense because he has zero fashion sense.
segments.cn: 这基本上是说某人对时尚或外表了解多少。

segments.en: And this is pretty much a way to say how much someone knows about fashion or appearances.
segments.cn: 所以我可以说，你知道，我的朋友凯西，她有很棒的时尚感。

segments.en: And so I can say, you know, oh, my friend Kathy, she has amazing fashion sense.
segments.cn: 所以她总是看起来很好。

segments.en: So she always looks good.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 所以适当地搭配颜色或穿着合适类型的鞋子与合适类型的衣服，等等，时尚感。

segments.en: Even just being able to wear things that are good on her or telling other people what's good on them.
segments.cn: 甚至只是能够穿着适合她的衣服或告诉其他人什么适合他们。

segments.en: So fashion sense is the ability to identify fashion and look good and make other people look good.
segments.cn: 所以时尚感是识别时尚、看起来好并让其他人看起来好的能力。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好吧。

segments.en: Very good.
segments.cn: 非常好。

segments.en: Let's listen to this dialogue for the very last time and we'll come back and talk a little bit more about fashion because it's a very interesting topic.
segments.cn: 让我们最后一次听这个对话，然后我们再谈谈时尚，因为这是一个非常有趣的话题。

segments.en: Honey, come on.
segments.cn: 亲爱的，快点。

segments.en: We're going to be late.
segments.cn: 我们要迟到了。

segments.en: Honestly, you take longer getting ready than I do.
segments.cn: 说实话，你准备的时间比我长。

segments.en: I was drying my hair and ironing my shirt.
segments.cn: 我在吹干头发和熨烫衬衫。

segments.en: Can you come here for a sec?
segments.cn: 你能过来一下吗？

segments.en: I need your help.
segments.cn: 我需要你的帮助。

segments.en: What is it?
segments.cn: 什么事？

segments.en: Why are all these clothes on the bed?
segments.cn: 为什么床上有这么多衣服？

segments.en: I don't know what to wear.
segments.cn: 我不知道穿什么。

segments.en: Okay.
segments.cn: 好吧。

segments.en: Give me your opinion.
segments.cn: 给我你的意见。

segments.en: Do you like the way this looks?
segments.cn: 你喜欢这个样子吗？

segments.en: The striped short sleeve shirt with this checkered sweater, my lucky sandals.
segments.cn: 这件条纹短袖衬衫配这件格子毛衣，我的幸运凉鞋。

segments.en: I like the cut and hemline of these shorts.
segments.cn: 我喜欢这条短裤的剪裁和下摆。

segments.en: So I think I'll wear these as well.
segments.cn: 所以我想我也会穿这些。

segments.en: Are you joking?
segments.cn: 你在开玩笑吗？

segments.en: What am I going to do with you?
segments.cn: 我该如何处理你？

segments.en: You're going to a dinner party, not to the beach.
segments.cn: 你是去参加晚宴，不是去海滩。

segments.en: Wear this shirt with the silk tie I bought you and those corduroy pants.
segments.cn: 穿这件衬衫和我给你买的丝质领带，还有那条灯芯绒裤子。

segments.en: It's chilly outside so you can wear this coat.
segments.cn: 外面有点冷，所以你可以穿这件外套。

segments.en: Thanks, honey.
segments.cn: 谢谢，亲爱的。

segments.en: You have such great fashion sense.
segments.cn: 你真有很好的时尚感。

segments.en: Now, what am I going to do with my hair?
segments.cn: 现在，我该如何处理我的头发？

segments.en: All right, we're back.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们回来了。

segments.en: You lived in Italy for a while.
segments.cn: 你在意大利住过一段时间。

segments.en: How is the fashion over there?
segments.cn: 那里的时尚怎么样？

segments.en: Is it extreme like we see on the runways?
segments.cn: 是像我们在时装秀上看到的那样极端吗？

segments.en: Because I honestly don't understand fashion.
segments.cn: 因为我真的不理解时尚。

segments.en: Well, the thing about runways is that that's not how normal people dress.
segments.cn: 嗯，关于时装秀的事情是，普通人并不是那样穿的。

segments.en: Well, yeah, that's what I understand.
segments.cn: 嗯，是的，我明白。

segments.en: Why do they have these fashion shows if people don't really buy these types of clothing?
segments.cn: 如果人们并不真正购买这些类型的衣服，为什么还要举办时装秀？

segments.en: Well, sometimes people like stores, for example, big stores, department stores will buy fashions off of the runway.
segments.cn: 嗯，有时人们喜欢商店，例如，大商店、百货商店会购买时装秀上的服装。

segments.en: And they'll kind of change them a little bit so that they're more appropriate for normal consumption.
segments.cn: 然后他们会稍微改变一下，使其更适合普通消费。

segments.en: That means for normal people who want to wear them.
segments.cn: 这意味着适合想穿它们的普通人。

segments.en: But the runway fashions are actually they're kind of like exaggerations of trends that will happen in in the shopping world, right in the commercial world.
segments.cn: 但时装秀上的时尚实际上是对购物世界、商业世界中将要发生的趋势的夸张表现，对吧？

segments.en: So the things that you see are like big blown up exaggerations.
segments.cn: 所以你看到的东西就像是被夸大的版本。

segments.en: And we take bits and pieces of those in our daily lives to dress up so different colors or fabrics or like oftentimes you see kind of military outfits.
segments.cn: 我们在日常生活中取其精华来打扮，比如不同的颜色或面料，或者你经常看到的军装。

segments.en: And so that will translate into military jackets that are very popular one one season.
segments.cn: 所以这会转化为某个季节非常流行的军装外套。

segments.en: And so Italy definitely counts as a very fashionable country, but it's not crazy people.
segments.cn: 所以意大利绝对算是一个非常时尚的国家，但并不是疯狂的人。

segments.en: You every once in a while you see some more crazy clothes.
segments.cn: 你偶尔会看到一些更疯狂的衣服。

segments.en: But I think Japan is much more crazy.
segments.cn: 但我认为日本更疯狂。

segments.en: Yeah, actually, yeah, Asian countries such as Japan or South Korea, they have very also unique fashion as well.
segments.cn: 是的，实际上，像日本或韩国这样的亚洲国家也有非常独特的时尚。

segments.en: But it's very extreme to a certain point.
segments.cn: 但在某种程度上是非常极端的。

segments.en: And the color combinations they do is like red sneakers with green pants and like a blue jacket.
segments.cn: 他们的颜色组合就像红色运动鞋配绿色裤子和蓝色夹克。

segments.en: It's very crazy, right?
segments.cn: 非常疯狂，对吧？

segments.en: And very bright.
segments.cn: 而且非常鲜艳。

segments.en: And you often see these shoes, you know, we call them platform shoes.
segments.cn: 你经常看到这些鞋子，我们称之为厚底鞋。

segments.en: They're it's kind of like you're standing on a brick.
segments.cn: 它们就像你站在砖头上一样。

segments.en: And they're, you know, they're seven inches tall.
segments.cn: 而且它们大约有七英寸高。

segments.en: And you see these little girls wearing these big shoes.
segments.cn: 你会看到这些小女孩穿着这些大鞋子。

segments.en: And I just I'm so scared when I see them because I feel like they're gonna fall over.
segments.cn: 我看到她们时真的很害怕，因为我觉得她们会摔倒。

segments.en: The other thing is that fashion is so expensive.
segments.cn: 另一件事是时尚是如此昂贵。

segments.en: If you actually want to buy something that's in like an authentic, I don't know, Caroline Herrera or Oscar de la Renta or something like that.
segments.cn: 如果你真的想买一些像卡罗琳·赫拉娜或奥斯卡·德拉伦塔这样的正品，

segments.en: It's so expensive.
segments.cn: 那是非常昂贵的。

segments.en: It is but you know, high fashion is expensive.
segments.cn: 确实如此，但你知道，高级时尚是昂贵的。

segments.en: Fashion is not doesn't have to be you can you can be fashionable just looking at different stores and going to secondhand shops and making your own clothes.
segments.cn: 时尚不一定要昂贵，你可以通过逛不同的商店、去二手商店和自己做衣服来时尚。

segments.en: I mean, it's all about a sense of personal style and dressing yourself to be unique.
segments.cn: 我是说，这完全是关于个人风格和让自己独特的穿着。

segments.en: Or you can get at the fake market.
segments.cn: 或者你可以去假货市场。

segments.en: Or you can go to the fake market.
segments.cn: 或者你可以去假货市场。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是如此。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: That's all the time we have for today, guys.
segments.cn: 今天我们只有这些时间，大家。

segments.en: I hope you enjoyed this lesson.
segments.cn: 希望你们喜欢这节课。

segments.en: Please come to our website and comment at EnglishPod.com.
segments.cn: 请访问我们的网站并在EnglishPod.com上留言。

segments.en: And if you have any other suggestions or maybe your own pictures of crazy fashion you can post.
segments.cn: 如果你有其他建议或自己疯狂时尚的照片，也可以发布。

segments.en: We're glad to see them.
segments.cn: 我们很高兴看到它们。

segments.en: So we'll see you guys there.
segments.cn: 所以我们在那儿见。

segments.en: Yeah, as Marco said, hope to see on the website.
segments.cn: 是的，正如Marco所说，希望在网站上见到你们。

segments.en: That's about it for today.
segments.cn: 今天就到这里。

segments.en: So goodbye, everyone.
segments.cn: 所以再见，大家。
